comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: The last of a series of trial polo matches was held at Lakewood, New Jersey, on May 7, 1914, prior to the opening of the season at Meadow Brook, L. I. [The photo is from the Bain Agency's May, 1914, photostream.] Larry Waterbury was a prominent player, according to a story in the New York Times on May 8: query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=9E03EFDC173AE6...

comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: I started a Wikipedia entry for him: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lawrence_Waterbury
